body:
Comment 1 by **nszabolcs**: 
atan2 is ok
  math.Atan2(math.Sin(a), math.Cos(a)) == a
holds

but the variable names in the interface are confusing (or the doc comment is wrong) 

x and y should be swapped
-func Atan2(x, y float64) float64 { 
+func Atan2(y, x float64) float64 { 
..with appropriate modifications of the function code
